Articles.Content:
Luke's Replicas and Cinematics

Hey all!

I'm Luke and, as anyone that roams these forums, I love KSP. Lately, I've been dedicating my time on making some fairly accurate replicas of real life spacecraft, looks-wise. My first replica is a classic, but one that I'm actually quite proud of, since it goes way beyond the boundaries of regular KSP.

Apollo 11

Yeah... we've all seen this one everywhere and it's been attempted by pretty much any player that ever played KSP, but as I said, I feel like it's worth showing. I only used the Procedural Fairings mod in the making of that behemoth, and for a 90% stock rocket, it does look quite faithful to the original (I hope).

Also, I did the full Apollo 11 mission, which I recorded on video. If you want to watch it, feel free...

The original version was a little messed up, this other one is a cinematic of the launch... for a first, I don't think it's too bad.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ChduYRVojQM

For any one wondering... more is coming

Edited January 16, 2015 by LukesWorks
Update of the page
